DOC.detailed_description: Poor management heart failure ( HF ) add high cost negative health outcome chronic illness , include frequent hospitalization . HF patient require close monitoring detect worsen health optimize treatment . However , many patient visit HF clinician every month , perform minimal self-monitoring . Remote patient monitoring potential tool help clinicians patient well manage HF . A remote patient monitoring system ( home monitoring vital sign symptom ) develop extensive clinician patient input test , study determine effect HF management . Half one hundred patient University Health Network Heart Failure Clinic randomly place remote monitoring ( RM ) group half control group . Patients RM group monitor weight , blood pressure , ECG , symptoms home 6 month . This information automatically send medical device wirelessly Bluetooth mobile phone , send information data server . Both clinician patient access data . Patients get automate reminder telephone call take number measurement prescribed doctor .
